WOWUP_UPDATE.INSTALL_MESSAGE: Do you want to restart WowUp and install the update?
WOWUP_UPDATE.NOT_AVAILABLE: Latest version of WowUp is already installed
WOWUP_UPDATE.PORTABLE_DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE:
Do you want to manually download the latest portable version?

You will need to close the app manually and copy over the new version.
WOWUP_UPDATE.SNACKBAR_TEXT: A new version of WowUp is available

ERRORS.CHANGE_PROVIDER_ERROR: Failed to change provider for {addonName} to {providerName}

ADDON_DETAILS.DEPENDENCY_TEXT: This addon has {dependencyCount} required {dependencyCount, plural, =1{dependency} other{dependencies}}

INSTALL_FROM_URL.DESCRIPTION: If you want to install an addon directly from a URL paste it below to get started.

ERROR.FAILED_TO_CONNECT: Cannot connect to API, please wait a bit and try again.
ERROR.INSTALL_FAILED:
Something went wrong when trying to install the addon, please try again.

If this message keeps showing up, you can get help on Discord in the #wowup-support channel.
ERROR.INVALID_URL:
The given value is not a valid URL. Examples of valid addon URLs are:
	- https://github.com/teelolws/Altoholic-Retail
	- https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info25610-8.3-014.html
	- https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/altoholic
ERROR.NO_ADDON_FOUND:
No addon was found, make sure your URL is pointing to the correct page.

When installing from github, please make sure the repository has a release tag with a zip archive containing the addon.
ERROR.TITLE: Addon Installation Failed

INSTALL_FROM_URL.TITLE: Install Addon URL

TELEMETRY.DESCRIPTION: Help improve WowUp by sending anonymous app install data and/or errors?
TELEMETRY.TITLE: WowUp Telemetry

CHANGE_ADDON_PROVIDER_CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE: Do you want to change the addon provider for {addonName} to {providerName}? This operation will uninstall your existing addon and replace it with a copy from the new provider.
CHANGE_ADDON_PROVIDER_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Change Addon Provider?

PAGE_CONTEXT_FOOTER.VIEW_GITHUB: Check out the code on GitHub
PAGE_CONTEXT_FOOTER.VIEW_GUIDE: Check out our guide to see what WowUp can do

MY_ADDONS.RESCAN_FOLDERS_BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Scan your client folder for installed addons
MY_ADDONS.RESCAN_FOLDERS_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION:
Doing a re-scan will attempt to guess which addons you currently have installed, doing so may reset known addon information. Use this function when certain addons are not recognized or addon versions are not being shown correctly. This scan will never delete your installed addons, only what WowUp knows about them.

Scanning may take a few moments.

UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_ACTION_EXPLANATION: Removing an addon via WowUp will remove the selected addon from your interface/addons directory. The character settings for this addon will not be removed.
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_LESS_THAN_THREE: Are you sure you want to remove the following {count} addons?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_MORE_THAN_THREE: Are you sure you want to remove the selected {count} addons?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_ONE: Are you sure you want to remove {addonName}?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.DEPENDENCY_MESSAGE: {addonName} has {dependencyCount} {dependencyCount, plural, =1{dependency} other{dependencies}}. Do you want to remove them also?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.TITLE: Uninstall {count, plural, =1{Addon} other{Addons}}?

MY_ADDONS.UPDATE_ALL_BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Update all addons for this client

APPLICATION.ENABLE_SYSTEM_NOTIFICATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Enable various system notification popups, such as auto updated addons.
APPLICATION.MINIMIZE_ON_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_MAC: When closing the WowUp window, minimize to the menu bar.
APPLICATION.MINIMIZE_ON_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_WINDOWS: When closing the WowUp window, minimize to the taskbar notification area.
APPLICATION.SET_LANGUAGE_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION: Changing the default language requires the application to restart.
APPLICATION.SET_LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION: Select a language to change to
APPLICATION.START_MINIMIZED_DESCRIPTION: WowUp will start minimized and not show up.
APPLICATION.START_WITH_SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION: WowUp will be started automatically when you start up your system.
APPLICATION.TELEMETRY_DESCRIPTION: Help improve WowUp by sending anonymous install data and/or errors.
APPLICATION.THEME_DESCRIPTION: Change the color theme to whatever you like
APPLICATION.TITLE: Application
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_DESCRIPTION: Disabling hardware acceleration might solve FPS issues and fix other rendering issues in this app. Changing this setting requires a restart.
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_DISABLE_CONFIR: Disabling hardware acceleration requires the application to restart.
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_ENABLE_CONFIRM: Enabling hardware acceleration requires the application to restart.

DEBUG.DEBUG_DATA_DESCRIPTION: Log debug data to help with diagnosing potential issues. This can be found in your latest log file for the curious.
DEBUG.LOG_FILES_DESCRIPTION: Open the folder that contains your last couple of log files.
DEBUG.TITLE: Debug

WOW.AUTO_UPDATE_DESCRIPTION: Newly installed addons will be set to auto update by default

CLEAR_INSTALL_LOCATION_DIALOG.MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to clear the install path for {clientName}? This will remove all stored addon information for this client.

Your addon folders will not be removed.
CLEAR_INSTALL_LOCATION_DIALOG.TITLE: Clear Install Location?

WOW.CLIENT_TYPE_INPUT_HINT: The folder that contains the {clientTypeName} client folder "{clientFolderName}"
WOW.RESCAN_CLIENTS_LABEL: Rescan installed World of Warcraft products
WOW.TITLE: World of Warcraft
